verbs.description: President Trump [V: is] calling it " the most sweeping action in history to lower the price of prescription drugs for the American people . "
[ARG0: President Trump] is [V: calling] [ARG1: it] [ARG2: " the most sweeping action in history to lower the price of prescription drugs for the American people] . "
President Trump is calling it " the most sweeping action in history to [V: lower] [ARG1: the price of prescription drugs for the American people] . "
